name: csv-ingest-backend
description: Backend for CSV Ingest + Grid MVP

scripts.seed: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const csv = require('csv-parser'); const { initDatabase } = require('./dist/database/init.js'); const { executeBatchInsert } = require('./dist/utils/database.js'); initDatabase(); const samplePath = path.join(__dirname, '../sample-data/sample.csv'); if (fs.existsSync(samplePath)) { console.log('Seeding database with sample data...'); const rows = []; fs.createReadStream(samplePath).pipe(csv()).on('data', (row) => rows.push(row)).on('end', () => { const insertQuery = 'INSERT INTO csv_data (part_mark, assembly_mark, material, thickness, quantity, length, width, height, weight, notes) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)'; const insertData = rows.map(row => [row['Part Mark'], row['Assembly Mark'], row['Material'], row['Thickness'], parseInt(row['Quantity']) || 1, parseFloat(row['Length']) || null, parseFloat(row['Width']) || null, parseFloat(row['Height']) || null, parseFloat(row['Weight']) || null, row['Notes'] || null]); executeBatchInsert(insertQuery, insertData); console.log('Database seeded successfully!'); }); } else { console.log('Sample data file not found'); }"
